aka: ラオガ：ひいばあちゃん
trans_title: ラオガ：ひいばあちゃん
introduction: 1943年，常德会战爆发，原本家住常德老城东门的富家小姐周小妹避难逃往乡下，战乱中遇到的爱情让她再也没有回到城市。在常德城郊的灌溪镇生活了73年，92岁的周小妹开始记忆减退，在虚幻与现实之中慢慢度过自己生命最后的日子。《Laoga》片名取自常德方言中曾外祖母之意，影片通过观察记录的方式走入了这位年岁近百的老人的日常生活，岁月静静流淌，往事一幕幕浮现。Laoga is an 18-minute short documentary film about the current life and past memories of a southern Chinese old widow in a small town called Guanxi, Changde (a southern Chinese city in Hunan province). Laoga means great-grandmother in Changde dialect (a variety of Southwestern Mandarin).As a ninety-two-year-old widow with fading short-term memory, Xiaomei Zhou struggles to find out the difference between reality and illusion. She is deeply influenced by Chinese traditional culture, and as a Christian, has her own thoughts about life and death.
